title: Vuelta a España Stage 2: Kaden Groves Pips Wout van Aert in Blistering Finale
content:
Key Kuss helper Van Baarle crashes out, McNulty cedes leader's jersey as Vuelta's first road stage ends in a reduced bunch sprint in a broiling stage.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 2: Kaden Groves Pips Wout van Aert in Blistering Finale on Velo.
author: ahood
